Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view

Class View

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.View
All Implemented Interfaces:
VirtualView, Remote
public class View extends Object implements VirtualView

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    View(UserInterface userInterface)
    Constructs a local View object that handles the incoming message from the server and display the game content through the provided user interface.

      Constructs a local View object that handles the incoming message from the server and display the game content through the provided user interface.
      Parameters:
      userInterface - the user interface that needs to be used to present game data to the user

    • setPlayerIdentifier

      public void setPlayerIdentifier(String playerIdentifier)
      Allows to set the client's playerIdentifier. The view will deliver the playerIdentifier to the ServerHandler that will put it in every outgoing message.
      Specified by:
      setPlayerIdentifier in interface VirtualView
      Parameters:
      playerIdentifier - the playerIdentifier generated by the server for this client

    • confirmJoin

      public void confirmJoin(String nickname, GameData savings)
      Allows to confirm that the local player has successfully joined a game. It also allows to provide game data that to rebuild the local model.
      Specified by:
      confirmJoin in interface VirtualView
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname that the clients chose when they joined the game.
      savings - if the player is rejoining a game, this ClientGameData object contains all data that the player need

      Parameters:
      nicknames - the array of nicknames of the players in the game.
      colors - the array of colors of the players in the game.

    • updateGameStatus

      public void updateGameStatus(GameStatus gameStatus, TurnStatus turnStatus, String playersTurn)
      Allows to update the game status data.
      Specified by:
      updateGameStatus in interface VirtualView
      Parameters:
      gameStatus - the current game phase
      turnStatus - the current turn status (either DRAW or PLACE)
      playersTurn - the nickname of the player that needs to play.

    • ping

      public void ping(boolean isAnswer)
      Allows to process a ping message.
      Specified by:
      ping in interface VirtualView
      Parameters:
      isAnswer - true if the server is answering to a previous ping message, false if the server is checking on the client.

    • sendChatMsg

      public void sendChatMsg(ChatMessage chatMessage, boolean isPrivate)
      Allows to forward a chat message to the local player. The message can be either public or private. The message can also be sent from the local player: this serves as an ack message that confirms that the message has been successfully delivered.
      Specified by:
      sendChatMsg in interface VirtualView
      Parameters:
      chatMessage - the ChatMessage object that contains info about the message
      isPrivate - true if the message is private, false otherwise

      Returns:
      the set of available games (might be outdated)
